title: Arthritis An Introduction
content:
* Some types of arthritis also affect your skin and internal organs.
  * Pain and stiffness are the most common symptoms.
  * The 3 most common types of arthritis are osteoarthritis, rheumatoid arthritis and gout arthritis.
  * There are things you can do to manage it well.


![Cyclist rides down a sunny country road](https://healthify.nz/assets/Healthy-Living/Exercise/Bike-rider-in-the-country-canva-950x690.jpg)
####  What are the different types of arthritis? 
#### Osteoarthritis
Osteoarthritis is the most common type of arthritis. It usually affects the 50-plus age group, and is slightly more common in women than men.
